items.title: Portugal vaccinates half mln people against COVID-19 in special campaign
items.summary: LISBON, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- More than 517,000 people received COVID-19 booster vaccinations during the first three weeks of Portugal's special vaccination campaign, the Directorate-General for Health (DGS) reported Tuesday. Read full story

items.title: WHO calls for urgent action on neurological care
items.summary: GENEVA, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- Neurological conditions affect more than 40 percent of the global population, or over 3 billion people, the World Health Organization (WHO) has said. Read full story

items.title: Microsoft officially ends support for Windows 10, which runs on ~40% of Windows PCs per Statcounter; users can enroll in an Extended Security Updates program (Andrew Cunningham/Ars Technica)
items.summary:
Andrew Cunningham / Ars Technica:
Microsoft officially ends support for Windows 10, which runs on ~40% of Windows PCs per Statcounter; users can enroll in an Extended Security Updates program  —  End users can get an extra year of security updates relatively easily.  —  Today is the official end-of-support date for Microsoft's Windows 10.

One such investment worth considering is this Greenworks model that you can power with the included 2.0Ah battery or by plugging into your vehicle’s 12V auxiliary outlet, making it well-suited to stay in your trunk until needed. There’s a digital display for real-time readouts, an auto-cut off function for safety and a prolonged lifespan, as well as built-in LED lights to see what you’re doing in the dark, and more.

items.title: Military says it has seized power in Madagascar after president moves to 'safe place'
items.summary: The military promises elections within two years, but President Rajoelina insists he is still in charge.

items.title: Inaudible sound might be the next frontier in wildfire defense
items.summary: Sonic Fire Tech has developed a device that can extinguish flames using acoustic energy below the range of human hearing. The startup is building a demo capable of protecting a home.

items.title: D'Angelo, trailblazing neo-soul singer, dies at 51, reports say
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -Grammy-winning R&B artist D'Angelo, a pioneer of neo-soul music, died at the age of 51 on Tuesday "after a prolonged and courageous battle with cancer," according to media reports citing a family statement. Read full story

items.title: Peru's Jeri taps constitutional lawyer to lead cabinet, party leader says
items.summary: LIMA (Reuters) -The former head of Peru's constitutional tribunal, Ernesto Alvarez, has accepted the role of cabinet chief in President Jose Jeri's new government, the head of Alvarez's party said on Tuesday. Read full story

items.summary:

items.title: US strikes another vessel off Venezuela coast, killing six
items.summary: President Trump said the vessel belonged to "narcoterrorists" and that it was "trafficking narcotics." US officials have not provided evidence to this claim.

items.title: Libya's central bank to print 11 bln USD worth of dinars to boost cash liquidity
items.summary: TRIPOLI, Oct. 14 (Xinhua) -- Libya's central bank said on Tuesday it has contracted to print 60 billion Libyan dinars (around 11.03 billion U.S. dollars) to maintain cash liquidity as it withdraws old banknotes from circulation. Read full story

items.title: UN warns of more Haitian children in crossfire as gang recruitment grows

items.title: Spotify partners with Netflix for video podcast distribution deal
items.summary: Spotify is partnering with Netflix to bring select video podcasts to the streaming platform starting in early 2026. The deal will feature curated shows from Spotify Studios and The Ringer, expanding later to include more genres. The move reflects Spotify’s growing focus on video as a key driver for engagement and ad revenue, with video podcast consumption now growing 20 times faster than audio-only content.

items.title: Heybike offers Hero carbon-fiber all-terrain e-bikes at best prices starting from new $1,899 low (Reg. $2,599+), more
items.summary:
Heybike has launched its Halloween Sale with up to $800 savings on e-bikes and some FREE gear accompanying models, which coincides with the launch of its newest Helio F Smart Classic e-bike, which you can learn about in our initial coverage from Electrek. Among the bunch, the largest discount is hitting Heybike’s Hero Carbon-Fiber All-Terrain e-bikes, which are seeing a new low on the 1,000W rear hub model at $1,899 shipped, while the upgraded 750W mid-drive model is keeping to its $2,299 shipped rate we saw during Prime Day. These two e-bikes usually fetch $2,599 and $3,099 at full price, with the latter having sat at this all-time low for the first time during the brand’s Prime Day Sale, while the former is dropping under its previous $2,099 low from that sale for an even better-than-ever deal. Head below to check out the full lineup of savings we’re seeing this spooky season.

items.title: Google updates Search and Discover with collapsible ads, AI features, and more
items.summary: Google is rolling out updates to Search and Discover that introduce AI-powered features, improved navigation, and a new option to collapse ads. While users can now hide sponsored results, the “Sponsored” label will remain visible as they scroll — making ads persistent even when collapsed. Additional changes include new sports updates in Search and AI-driven topic previews in the Discover feed, launching first in the U.S., South Korea, and India.
